```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
n = range(1, 11)
perm = [math.perm(x) for x in n]
comb = [math.comb(x, 2) for x in n]

plt.plot(n, perm, label='Permuta√ß√µes P(n)', marker='o')
plt.plot(n, comb, label='Combina√ß√µes C(n,2)', marker='s')
plt.title("Permuta√ß√µes e Combina√ß√µes")
plt.xlabel("n")
plt.ylabel("Contagem")
plt.grid(True)
plt.legend()
plt.show()
```
